fr.uv1.bettingServices

Interface Betting

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BettingSoft

    public interface Betting
    Author:
    prou + mallet

    This interface declares all methods that should be provided by a betting software.

    • Method Detail

      • subscribe

        java.lang.String subscribe(java.lang.String a_name,
                         java.lang.String a_firstName,
                         java.lang.String a_username,
                         java.lang.String a_birthDay,
                         java.lang.String a_managerPwd)
                           throws AuthenticationException,
                                  ExistingSubscriberException,
                                  BadParametersException
        Subscribe.
        Parameters:
        a_name - the last name of the subscriber.
        a_firstName - the first name of the subscriber.
        a_username - the username of the subscriber.
        a_managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Returns:
        password for the new subscriber
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingSubscriberException - raised if a subscriber exists with the same username.
        BadParametersException - raised if last name, first name or username are invalid.

      • unsubscribe

        void unsubscribe(java.lang.String a_username,
               java.lang.String a_managerPwd)
                 throws AuthenticationException,
                        ExistingSubscriberException
        delete a subscriber.
        Parameters:
        a_username - the username of the subscriber.
        a_managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the manager's password is incorrect.
        ExistingSubscriberException - raised if username is not registered.

      • listSubscribers

        java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String>> listSubscribers(java.lang.String a_managerPwd)
                                                                           throws AuthenticationException
        list subscribers.
        Parameters:
        a_managerPwd - the manager's password.
        Returns:
        a list of list of strings:
        • subscriber's lastname
        • subscriber's firstname
        • subscriber's username
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the manager's password is incorrect.

      • changeMngrPwd

        void changeMngrPwd(java.lang.String newPwd,
                 java.lang.String currentPwd)
                   throws AuthenticationException,
                          BadParametersException
        change manager's password.
        Parameters:
        newPwd - the new manager's password.
        currentPwd - the manager's password.
        Throws:
        AuthenticationException - raised if the current manager's password is incorrect.
        BadParametersException - raised if the new manager's password is invalid.

        lastname - Competitor's last name
